experience: You and Mark both know Jeff Cable, Jeff Pulver, and 11 others
The Commitment Contract - Last day at Harvard Business School
Harvard Business School Lecture Room Design.  Perfect for focusing and engaging.

Courtland Brooks serves Internet dating and matchmaking companies.  Our team of seasoned world-class professionals provide strategy, marketing, business development, social media and media relations services.  Online Personals Watch interviews top executives in the industry and summarises the daily news for the dating industry executive.  I also run the Internet Dating Executive Alliance (IDEA).  I'm the leading consultant and analyst of the dating industry.  See 250+ prior major media press quotes at www.AllOurPress.com
Greater New York City Area & Moscow & Malta

Helped inspire the creation of Social Discovery Ventures.  Helped increase revenue from $110 million in 2012 to $140 million in 2013 (27% increase).  Handled top tier press interviews.  Named a new Internet dating category (PID-Premium International Dating).  Made the introductions that led to the acquisition of Dating.com.  Guided the formation of new service level guarantees that helped incrementally improve the integrity of the PID-agency model.  Supported internal team of 40 marketing professionals, as well as external PR and social media agencies.  Reported to the CEO Oleg Nochka, and to the Founder.

The CEO/Founder of POF, Markus Frind, retained me and the Courtland Brooks team for media relations, business development and strategic advice. Personally negotiated and secured the acquisition of the pof.com domain. Sourced and engaged psychologist for the first 40 question compatibility profile on POF.  Advised broadly on strategy. Personally handled top-tier press including Inc. magazine cover article. *POF was sold in 2015 for $575 million to IAC/Match.com*.  Advised and reported to Founder/CEO Markus Frind and COO Kate Manolis.

ACE stood for Adventure, Camaraderie, and Entertainment. ACE-CLUB.com was Silicon Valley's adventure and social club for professionals. It was sold and merged into UrbanDiversion.com in October 2007 to allow them to expand into Silicon Valley. Early members included FriendFinder CEO Andrew Conru and '4 Hour Work Week' author Tim Ferriss. I personally ran over 300 events and inspired and trained over 50 people to become ACE event hosts.

As Cupid's VP I was responsible for acquisitions, site monetization, business  development, and strategy. I guided the overhaul of the site design and inspired and led the acquisition of the world's largest speed-dating company which we subsequently integrated and expanded into 70 US cities.  Reported to the CEO/co-Founder Eric Straus.
PLD - Harvard's Alternative to an Executive MBA

The Program for Leadership Development is officially Harvard Business School's flagship Masters euivalent and 'alternative to an executive MBA.'  I'm an active Harvard Alumni member since completing this course.
PLD - Harvard's Alternative to an Executive MBA

The Program for Leadership Development is officially Harvard Business School's flagship Masters euivalent and 'alternative to an executive MBA.'  I'm an active Harvard Alumni member since completing this course.
The London School of Economics and Political Science (LSE)

16 month Executive MSc in Behavioral Economics and Psychology.  Studied human behavior, biases and heuristics.  The course focuses on the insights of Daniel Kahnemann (Thinking Fast and Slow) and Dan Ariely (Predictably Irrational) and Thaler & Sunstein (Nudge).  Led by a Kahnemann protege Professor Paul Dolan (Happiness By Design) who was also my dissertation advisor.  Graduated December 2016.

Anthony Volpe
Chief Engagement Officer at MotorCrew
August 3, 2016, Anthony worked with Mark in different groups

It was a sincere pleasure to work with Mark when he was the Chief Strategy Officer at Social Discovery Ventures.  His strategic approach, solid connections within the online dating industry, and keen KPI-oriented approach meant that his accomplishments were numerous and substantial --- including creating the naming of Premium International Dating for our category, introducing us to the owners of Dating.com, a domain which we later acquired, and leading our efforts to create new service levels --- all of which positively impacted our business.  As well, Mark’s unbridled enthusiasm, positive attitude, and collaborative nature means that he’s a joy to work with.  A recommendation and advice from my side for any individual or company looking to improve their lot within the online dating category / industry, “Work with Mark Brooks and it’ll get done, and right.”

Steve Bonacich
IDEC Corporation, Sales Manager
January 14, 2016, Steve was senior to Mark but didn’t manage directly

In the time Mark Brooks and I spent at Keyence, I came to realize what a tremendous asset he was to the corporation. Not only was he highly technical, working with laser and confocal measurement products, but he was highly attentive to the needs of his customers.  Mark had a very large and diverse territory to cover, from the high tech of the Silicon Valley to packaging machinery in the Western US and Canada.Mark did an outstanding job with his distribution network, by working closely with them he would get to know their territory, their weaknesses and strengths. I recall him frequently conducting trainings and seminars in an effort to grow his region. Mark was well liked by his customers, distributors and his colleagues at the office.I would highly recommend Mark in any of his future endeavors, he is an aggressive yet empathetic individual, which I find to be very important traits in an organization focused on growth. His entrepreneurial spirit and ability to understand the "big picture" was key to his success, he is a self starter who could be asked to do a project and trusted to take the appropriate steps to realize his goal.

summary: I've been in love with and immersed in the business of love (Internet dating apps & matchmaking services) since 1998 and operate the daily news summary service OnlinePersonalsWatch.com, the niche agency-consultancy Courtland Brooks and the Internet Dating Executive Alliance (IDEA).  {See www.IDEA.gp for the Facebook group, and www.IDEA.gd on Linkedin}The press have quoted me 250+ times on the business of Internet dating, including 17 quotes in Wall Street Journal.  See AllOurPress.com.  I've keynoted at 45 'iDate' Internet Dating business conferences around the world.I run the Courtland Brooks consultancy-agency which is a team of seasoned Internet dating business  professionals.  Courtland Brooks provides strategy, marketing, business development, social media and media relations services to Internet dating apps and matchmaking businesses around the world.  We also help companies with best-in-class products to approach the dating industry.  We've helped PlentyofFish, Cupid, Social Discovery Ventures, iovation and 100+ clients to improve their strategy and grow.See clients and testimonials at courtlandbrooks.com/clients  __In 2014 I completed Harvard Business School's PLD program, their alternative to an Executive MBA and am an active Harvard alumni member.  From 2015-2017 I completed an Executive MSc in Behavioral Science at London School of Economics. I believe the future effectiveness of Internet dating services will hinge on our ability to utilise AI, recognise behavior traits and correlate them to character, and predict compatibility. You can find me in Malta, U.S.A. or Dubai.Schedule a meeting with me at www.meetme.so/MarkBrooksSchedule an initial one hour consultation at https://secure.scheduleonce.com/markbrooksconsultEmail me at markbrooks@alumni.harvard.edu If you're a member of the press on deadline please email me for the quickest response, and I'll call you back or answer your questions via email, as you prefer.
name: Mark Brooks
